item.title: Elasticsearch Bulk API Example and Performance Comparison
item.description: Elasticsearch provides bulk operations to perform multiple operations in a single call. Bulk APIs can be accessed by hitting the _bulk endpoint. This post demonstrates the use of bulk API with Python. It assumes that you are familiar (not expert) with REST Bulk API of Elasticsearch. To keep it simple we will just consider the insertion case.
